name: A Fish-Tank Freedom - Rescue from the Ocean's Water Free Kids Fishing Game
name_original: A Fish-Tank Freedom - Rescue from the Ocean's Water Free Kids Fishing Game
description:
** TOP 200 in over 30 Countries! **

Splish, Splash and Swim to freedom and a life full of fun and adventure. Bubble shoot your way past the mean sharks and puffer fish while making your escape in this super cute, fun, free childrens game for iPhone and iPad.

Georgi the goldfish has escaped the fish tank on a quest for the great outdoors and the deep blue sea, but there are dangers ahead and she will need your help to guide her through. Her friends Kandi Koi, Dori Dolphin and Tia Turtle are still swimming around the tiny goldfish tank that was once home, awaiting the day that Georgi can free them too.

Her quest has begun and she must hurry! Help Georgi collect all the life savers bobbing about in the sea, with them she will be able to rescue her friends and they too will enjoy freedom. Find the clocks, magnets and bombs on your journey through the waters, they are friendly and will lend a hand to speed you on your way.

So wiggle those fins, swish that tail and join little Georgi and friends on their great swim to freedom.

Features :

- Swim through gorgeous blue seas
- 4 Cute and loveable characters
- One Touch Game Play
- Tons of power ups
- Charming Aquatic Adventure
- Game Center Leaderboards
